document.full_text: south africans voted on wednesday in municipal elections in which squalid, open toilets built for the poor have become a potent symbol of local government neglect, nearly 20 years after apartheid ended.
document.title: toilet row grabs headlines in south african election
lines_and_colors: south africans voted on wednesday in municipal elections in which squalid, open toilets built for the poor have become a potent symbol of local government neglect, nearly 20 years after apartheid ended.
